nodes.text: Spiced nysillim tea was a sweet medicinal tea that was served at Old Jho's Pit Stop, a cantina on the planet Lothal run by the Ithorian Jho. The tea was one of the human Jedi Knight Kanan Jarrus's top five favorite desserts served in the establishment.
Spiced nysillim tea was also enjoyed by Maz Kanata.
Spiced nysillim tea was first mentioned in Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a reference book released in 2015.
